text: Stanley Wilson Williams (September 14, 1936 â€“ February 20, 2021) was an American baseball pitcher. He played 14 seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB). He played for the Los Angeles Dodgers, New York Yankees, Cleveland Indians, Minnesota Twins, St. Louis Cardinals and Boston Red Sox between 1958 and 1972. Williams died on February 20, 2021, at his home in Laughlin, Nevada from heart and respiratory failure, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:New York Yankees players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Sportspeople from New Hampshire Category:Sportspeople from Colorado Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from respiratory failure
title: Stan Williams (baseball)
